title: ninnuvinAgadhevarO
sahitya:
ninnuvinAgadevvarO nIraja lOcana rAma

anupallavi

 manasu tallaTillu nIvu maraciyuNTide nAku

caraNam 1

 ghana bhavAmbudhini cikki venaka mundu tOcalEka 
dina dinamunu digulu jendi dInuDaina nAku
 
caraNam 2

 dhanikuliNTla tirigi tirigi kanula bASpamolka vAri 
nanusarinci dayanu gOri dinamu kaDupu cunna nAku
 
caraNam 3

 pAmaruDaina nannu nI mAya dharimpa jEsi 
rAmapuravAsuDaina rAmacandra nannu brOva
